thumb.title: Tried to record a simple clip in our survival game. The forest had other plans.
thumb.description: We made a survival game. Players were supposed to look for food, water, and escape. Instead, they vibed. The forest did too. Now we just watch the chaos unfold. https://store.steampowered.com/app/3822530/Camp_Wombo/?beta=0#キャンプウォンボ #インディーゲーム #サバイバルゲーム #マルチプレイ #面白いゲーム
